text: Hello! How are you doing this evening?
Fine and you?
I am well, thank you. Have you heard of the organization called Save the Children? :)
Seen a couple of commercials in the past....
It's a great organization. Have you donated in the past or considered donating?
Ive donated to other donations but not Save the Children...
What organizations do you donate to? :)
None right now, where does the donations go towards?

The donations for Save The Children goes towards education, medical attention and general safety of children. In 3rd world countries they lead efforts to educate young children and in violent countries (such as Syria) they are actively setting up places for children to remain safe.
Sound decent, are you donating?
I will be donating today, yes. They are a truly great organization and 86% of their donations go straight toward funding their programs.
Ok lets get started...
Would you like to know any more about the organization before donating part of your earnings today?
Nope im ready, and fyi your messages are coming slow, we have ten minutes to chat and you averaging 2 min a message so if you dont mind can we speed this up?
Yes. My apologies.
I would like to donate $0.50.....
Thank you! Following this chat conversation, you will be prompted to enter your donation amount before submitting the HIT.
Ok it was nice chatting with you
You as well, thank you for donating :)
ok you too.....
